name: Sparta 2035
storyline:
In the near future, East Africa is being overrun by militants of a radical movement the Da'amat. One of the local leaders, president Sefu Kanindo, calls for help from the "Sparta" — a legendary squad of hired guns.

Player will take a commanding role over "Sparta" and help them put an end to these terrorists once and for all.

Lead tactical operations, manage your squad, develop your base and upgrade your gear for eliminating terrorist leaders and putting an end to the tyranny in East Africa.
summary: "Sparta 2035" is a turn-based tactics game in the spirit of a classic action movie. Control a squad of mercenaries, complete missions and liberate Africa from terrorists.
